page.title: 20NORTON FLOWER SHOW,STOCKTON
page.content: EACH YEAR IN AUGUST THE VILLAGE BUSTLES WITH EXCITEMENT IN PREPARATION FOR THE ANNUAL FLOWER SHOW. THE VILLAGE FOOTBALL PITCH IS A HIVE OF ACTIVITY,MARQUEES BEING ERECTED, STALLS SET UP AND PRODUCE PUT ON DISPLAY.THERE IS SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE, WITH PRIZES & TROPHIES FOR MANY. THE CHILDREN HAVE RACES, PAINTING COMPETITIONS & FLOWER AND VEGETABLE ENTRIES. THE FLOWER AND PRODUCE TENT IS FULL OF PRIME VEGETABLES EACH COMPETING WITH OTHERS PROVIDED BY THE VILLAGERS. BEAUTIFUL BLOOMS OF FLOWERS ADD THEIR SCENT TO THE MARQUEE AND ALL IS A MASS OF COLOUR. THERE ARE MANY AND VARIED STALLS SOME SELLING PRODUCE, OTHERS AWAIT YOU TO DUCK SOME POOR UNFORTUNATE OR KICK A FOOTBALL THROUGH A HOOP.A CLAY PIGEON STAND ATTRACTS MANYAS DOES THE PONY RIDES..
